meanings.definition: The quality or state of being blurry.
meanings.sent1: The blurrinesses of the photo made it hard to recognize the people.
meanings.sent2: She struggled to read the sign due to the blurrinesses of her vision.
meanings.sent3: The blurrinesses in the painting gave it a dream-like quality.
meanings.sent4: The blurrinesses of his memory made it difficult to recall the details.
meanings.sent5: The blurrinesses of the fog enveloped the entire landscape.

meanings.definition: The lack of clearness or sharpness in an image or visual perception.
meanings.sent1: The blurrinesses in the photograph made the faces unrecognizable.
meanings.sent2: His tired eyes struggled to focus, resulting in blurrinesses in his sight.
meanings.sent3: The blurrinesses of the mirror made her reflection look distorted.
meanings.sent4: The blurrinesses of the scene added a sense of mystery to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The blurrinesses of the distant mountains created a serene atmosphere.
